verses.roman:
prabhure śayyāte āni' susthira karāilā
'kāṅhe kailā ei tumi?'--svarūpa puchilā

synonyms: prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śayyāte—to the bed; āni'-bringing; su-sthira karāilā—made Him pacified; kāṅhe—why; kailā—have done; ei—this; tumi—You; svarūpa puchilā—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī inquired.
translation: They brought the Lord to His bed, calmed Him and then asked, "Why have You done this to Yourself?"
